printed_text: The first time you rez a piece of ice each turn, you may search R&D for another copy of that ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you rez a piece of ice each turn, you may search R&D for another copy of that ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run not made through a card ability on his or her turn, the Runner must spend [click].
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run not made through a card ability on his or her turn, the Runner must spend click.

flavor: "There are many advantages to having facilities on the moon. Less traffic, for example." -Director Hass
printed_text: If the Runner loses or spends a click during a run on this server, he or she loses all credits in his or her credit pool. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner loses or spends a click during a run on this server, he or she loses all credits in his or her credit pool. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: "Binary computing is obsolete. I use a base-4 structure for this system; it's modeled on our DNA. Well, my DNA, anyway." -Doctor Endo, Jinteki researcher
printed_text: All code gate ice have +1 strength. When you score Encrypted Portals, gain 1[credit] for each rezzed code gate.
stripped_printed_text: All code gate ice have +1 strength. When you score Encrypted Portals, gain 1 credit for each rezzed code gate.

flavor: Her eyes were the color of a vidscreen, tuned to a dead channel.
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's identity text box is blank.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's identity text box is blank.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Name a card. Gain 10[credit] whenever the Runner plays or installs a copy of that card.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Name a card. Gain 10 credits whenever the Runner plays or installs a copy of that card.

flavor: Throw enough data at a runner and it ceases to have any meaning at all.
printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Information Overload, <trace>trace 1</trace> if the trace is successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
Information Overload gains "[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards." for each tag the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Information Overload, trace 1 if the trace is successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Information Overload gains "Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards." for each tag the Runner has.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Gain 1[credit] whenever the Runner makes a successful run.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Gain 1 credit whenever the Runner makes a successful run.

flavor: Nothing is impenetrable. The key is to make breaking into it more costly than what it's worth.
printed_text: 1[credit]: Move any number of credits from your credit pool to this asset. [click]: Take any number of credits from this asset. [trash]: Take any number of credits from this asset.
stripped_printed_text: 1 credit: Move any number of credits from your credit pool to this asset. click: Take any number of credits from this asset. trash: Take any number of credits from this asset.

printed_text:
Ignore the install cost of the first piece of ice you install each turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: Ignore the install cost of the first piece of ice you install each turn. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: "I don't care how good your console is, or how tricked out your rig is. The lag time on a run on the moon from earthside can be a killer." -Leela Patel
printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. All ice have +1 strength.

printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, you may trash Will-o'-the-Wisp. If you do, choose an icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of his or her stack.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, you may trash Will-o'-the-Wisp. If you do, choose an icebreaker that was used to break at least 1 subroutine during this run. The Runner adds that icebreaker to the bottom of his or her stack.

flavor: Sometimes a single stone is enough.
printed_text: Place 3 power counters on D4v1d when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a strength of 5 or greater.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 power counters on D4v1d when it is installed. Hosted power counter: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a strength of 5 or greater.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first piece of ice encountered each turn has -2 strength for the remainder of the run.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first piece of ice encountered each turn has -2 strength for the remainder of the run.

flavor: In this business, you had to anticipate. If you weren't three steps ahead, you were three steps behind.
printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
When this turn ends, gain 2[credit] for each successful run you made during it.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. When this turn ends, gain 2 credits for each successful run you made during it.

flavor: What goes up must always go down.
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot install more than 1 piece of ice each turn.

flavor: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette
printed_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1 credit.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit during a run.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. 1 recurring credit Use this credit during a run.

flavor: Originally not very popular, the regulator was overlooked by those who used energy sinks to protect their rig. But it quickly found an audience once Smoke casted a run on a Blue Sun server, using it to keep her rig online while repeatedly diverting energy spikes in excess of 50,000 volts.
printed_text: 3[credit] or [trash]: Prevent an installed piece of hardware from being trashed.
stripped_printed_text: 3 credits or trash: Prevent an installed piece of hardware from being trashed.

flavor: In the spaces between the data, do trapped souls from the past persist?
printed_text:
Place 3[credit] on Ghost Runner when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Ghost Runner, trash it.
You can use the credits on Ghost Runner during a run.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 credits on Ghost Runner when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Ghost Runner, trash it. You can use the credits on Ghost Runner during a run.
